name: SPACE not so basic SHOOTER
description:
Hi!
This is a simple space shooter! with a little bit of rogue like mechanics here and there!

This is a little game project that whould go on mobile, but becouse reasons is not ready for it.
Try it and live a feedback if you want!! it will pleasure me. A LOT :)
Otherwise we'll see on the next project!

(press  F1 and F2 to switch resolution)

Credit: https://blodyavenger.itch.io/2d-retro-space-shooter-assets
